a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The number of reported deaths from cholera. Testing and reporting is limited in many countries.
Note: In outbreak situations, cases of acute watery diarrhea caused by other pathogens may be reported as cholera cases when
laboratory confirmation is not available or feasible for all suspected cases. Reported causes of death are limited by death registration
